intelligence_grade_justification: Strong data on offerings and pricing model. Credit-based system well documented. Exact credit package prices not fully captured (dynamic page). Social media and review data partial.

company_profile.parent_organization: British Council (UK Government cultural relations body)
company_profile.employee_count: Not captured — global org with 10,000+ worldwide

general_english_adults.description: Modular English course — students buy credit packages, redeem against modules and Flex lessons
general_english_adults.format: Modules of 6x 90-minute lessons (6 credits per module). Flex lessons for additional practice.
general_english_adults.schedule: Bookable — can schedule a lesson any time before it starts. Cancellation up to 24 hours keeps credit.
general_english_adults.modular_courses: New 20-credit prebooked timetable courses also available
general_english_adults.certificates: Digital certificate and badge for every module completed

ielts_preparation.note: Course pricing not publicly listed — contact required
ielts_preparation.ielts_test_administration: British Council is the official IELTS test administrator in Georgia

online_alternative.name: IELTS Coach
online_alternative.format: 48 live online classes covering all 4 sections

business_english.note: Uses same credit-based pricing as general English

primary_plus.description: Six-level course designed by British Council
primary_plus.note: Exact fee not captured in search results

english_online.trial: Free 7-day trial with 2 free class credits
formats: Private classes (1 credit = group, 2 credits = private)

exam_preparation_cambridge.available: Likely (offered at other BC centres), not explicitly confirmed for Georgia
exam_preparation_cambridge.note: BC Greece offers FCE/CAE prep — Georgia likely similar

free_resources.description: Wide range of free online resources for adults, teens, and children
free_resources.note: No free courses, only supplementary materials

adult_group_bulk_package.note: Achieved with larger credit packages (40 or 60 credits)

pricing_intelligence.pricing_model: Credit-based — buy packages of 20/40/60 credits, redeem against modules and Flex. Bulk discounts. Instalments available. No hidden registration fees.
pricing_intelligence.vs_ih_tbilisi: BC starts at 31 GEL/1.5hr vs IH at 350 GEL/month (3x/wk = ~29 GEL/1.5hr). Comparable entry pricing, but BC's bulk packages can go as low as 12 GEL/hr — significantly cheaper than IH at scale.
pricing_intelligence.referral_program: Refer a friend: you get 5 free credits, friend gets 50% off first month

instagram.assessment: Moderate presence. 4.1K followers with consistent posting (1903 posts). Much stronger than IH Tbilisi (697) but below Beka's School (25K).

facebook.note: Active — encouraged on website. Linktree links to FB page. Follower count not captured.

social_media_intelligence.linktree: linktr.ee/geBritish — links to Instagram, Facebook, courses, MOOCs, Rate Us
social_media_intelligence.note_british_centre: Separate entity 'British Centre Georgia' (@britishcentregeorgia) has 17K followers — NOT the same as British Council

reviews_intelligence.other: Linktree includes a 'Rate Us' option — suggests they actively collect reviews
reviews_intelligence.teacher_quality: CELTA/DELTA qualified, internationally experienced, communicative method

target_segments: Parents investing in children's long-term English education (annual programs)
IELTS test takers (captive audience — BC administers the test)
Budget-conscious adults who benefit from bulk credit discounts
Self-directed learners who want modular, mix-and-match courses
value_propositions: Official IELTS test administrator in Georgia
UK Government backed — maximum institutional credibility
Flexible credit-based system — pay for what you use
No hidden fees — transparent pricing model
positioning.differentiation_from_ih: Flexibility (credit system vs fixed schedule), IELTS test monopoly, lower per-hour rates at bulk

strengths: IELTS test administration monopoly — students who test with BC often prep with BC
Credit-based flexible pricing — unique in market, appeals to busy professionals
Bulk pricing as low as 12 GEL/hr — cheapest premium provider
UK Government backing — unmatched institutional credibility
Free 7-day online trial — low acquisition barrier
Referral program (5 free credits) — word-of-mouth engine
Strong content ecosystem (free online resources, English Clubs)
weaknesses: Credit system complexity — harder to understand than simple monthly pricing
Social media weaker than Beka's School
strategic_vulnerabilities: Dependent on IELTS relevance — if Duolingo English Test gains traction, IELTS monopoly weakens
Credit system may confuse price-sensitive customers who want simple monthly billing
No visible B2B corporate program — Beka's School dominates this
Annual kids programs (1950 GEL) are high commitment — parents may prefer monthly

marketing_tactics.trial_offer: Free 7-day trial for online courses (2 free class credits)
marketing_tactics.referral_program: Refer a friend: 5 free credits for referrer, 50% off first month for friend
marketing_tactics.promotions: Bulk credit discounts (more you buy, more you save)
marketing_tactics.content_marketing: Free online resources, English Clubs, MOOCs
marketing_tactics.ads_observed: Not captured — Facebook Ad Library not checked
